translation.en: [boy 1] We're the Pogues, and our mission this summer
translation.zh:
‎我们是小鱼儿
‎今年夏天的任务是过得快乐

translation.en: is to have a good time, all the time.
translation.zh:
‎我们是小鱼儿
‎今年夏天的任务是过得快乐 ‎每时每刻都快乐

translation.en: [boy 2] That's what, a three-story fall to the deck?
translation.zh:
‎那相当于从三层高的地方
‎落到甲板上吗？

translation.en: I give you about a one-in-three chance of survival.
translation.zh: ‎你活下来的几率大概是三分之一

translation.en: -Should I do it? -[boy 2] Yeah, jump.
-I'll shoot you on the way down. -You'll shoot me?
translation.zh:
‎你跳下来时 我就开枪 ‎-你要开枪射我？
‎-对

translation.en: -[boy 2] Yep. -Pow! They're gonna have Japanese toilets with towel warmers.
translation.zh: ‎他们要弄日式厕所和浴巾加热器

translation.en: -[boy 3] Of course. Why wouldn't they? -This used to be a turtle habitat,
translation.zh:
‎-他们当然会 为什么不呢？
‎-这里曾是海龟栖息地

translation.en: but who cares about the turtles, I guess?
-[boy 3] I can't have cold towels. -Can you please not kill yourself?
translation.zh: ‎我没法用冷毛巾 ‎你能别自杀吗？

translation.en: Don't spill that beer. I'm not giving you another one.
translation.zh: ‎啤酒别洒了 ‎我不会再给你了

translation.en: [boy 1] Whoa! Oh, shit.
-[boy 3] Of course you did. -Smooth.
[girl] Dumbass.
-[man] Hey! -Hey, uh, security's here.
-Let's wrap it up. -Boys are early today.
Humpty Dumpty, let's roll. [exclaims]
-[boy 1] Yeah. -Let's go, boys.
[boy 3] Gary, is that you? -[boy 2] Get down. -[boy 3] It's me.
translation.zh:
‎-盖瑞 是你吗？
‎-嘿 你知道是我

translation.en: -Gary, good to see you, man! -[boy 1] Is it time?
translation.zh:
‎-盖瑞 见到你真好 伙计！
‎-时间到了？

translation.en: -You're asking for it. -[Gary] JJ!
-♪ Watch his right hand slip... ♪ -[Gary] Hey, stop!
Get 'em! They're comin' your way!
translation.zh: ‎抓住他们！他们朝你那边来了！

translation.en: Hey! Stop!
-[guard] I got him! -[JJ] Not much of a hugger!
translation.zh:
‎-我逮到他了
‎-我不喜欢拥抱 伙计！

translation.en: [JJ] Go, Pope! Go! Go, go, go, go, go, go!
-[JJ] Get up, Pope, fatso's coming. -[guard] Hey!
translation.zh:
‎-起来 教皇 快 我们走
‎-嘿！

translation.en: Come here, you little pricks!
-[horn honks] -[boy 1] Bus is leaving!
[girl] Come on, boys! Whoo!
[Gary] Hey, hey! Hey! Hey!
-Check out Gary, gunnin' for a raise. -[JJ] Come on, Gary!
translation.zh:
‎-瞧 盖瑞好卖命
‎-来呀 盖瑞！

translation.en: -Wait. Slow down. -Hey! You little pricks!
translation.zh:
‎-等等 慢点
‎-嘿 小混蛋！

translation.en: -[Gary] Hey! -You're gonna give him a heart attack.
translation.zh: ‎停下 各位 你们要让他心脏病发作了

translation.en: You're so close! You can do it. There you go.
-[groans] They don't pay you enough, bro. -JJ, stop. Stop.
translation.zh:
‎-他们给你的薪水少了 兄弟
‎-JJ 停下

translation.en: Oh, come on. That sort of initiative is just begging to be punished.
translation.zh: ‎得了 这样的惩罚是他们自找的

translation.en: -♪ Oh, no ♪ -[teens chatting indistinctly]
translation.zh: ‎（欢迎来到外滩 人间天堂）

translation.en: [boy 1] The Outer Banks, Paradise on Earth.
It's the sort of place where you either have two jobs or two houses.
translation.zh:
‎在这里 要么你打两份工
‎要么你有两套房

translation.en: Two tribes, one island.
[boy 1] All right. This is Figure Eight, the rich side of the island.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这里是八字区 岛上富有的一边

translation.en: Home of the Kooks. So, guess where we don't live.
translation.zh: ‎鲨鱼们的家 ‎所以我们不住在这里

translation.en: [girl] Whoo!
translation.zh: ‎（禁止钓鱼 小鱼儿的地盘 ）

translation.en: [boy 1] And then, this is the south side or the cut.
translation.zh: ‎而这里是南边 也称“僻地”

translation.en: Home of the working class who make a living busing tables,
translation.zh: ‎工薪阶层住的地方 人们靠当服务生

translation.en: washing yachts, running charters.
translation.zh: ‎洗游艇和运营租船业务为生

translation.en: The natural habitat of... drumroll, please...
...the Pogues.
translation.zh: ‎小鱼儿的自然栖息地 就是我们

translation.en: That's us.
translation.zh: ‎小鱼儿的自然栖息地 就是我们 ‎（HMS小鱼儿号）

translation.en: -Pogues, pogies, the throwaway fish. -[exhales]
translation.zh:
‎小鱼儿 小鲫鱼 被扔掉的鱼
‎处于食物链的底端

translation.en: [boy 1] Lowest member of the food chain. Okay. So, the downside of Pogue life
translation.zh:
‎小鱼儿 小鲫鱼 被扔掉的鱼
‎处于食物链的底端 ‎好吧 身为小鱼儿的缺点是被人忽略

translation.en: is we're ignored and neglected.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 身为小鱼儿的缺点是被人忽略

translation.en: But the upside of Pogue life? We're ignored and neglected,
translation.zh: ‎但身为小鱼儿的优点：也是被人忽略

translation.en: which means we do whatever we want, whenever we want.
translation.zh: ‎这意味着我们随时都能随心所欲

translation.en: -[JJ] Nice haul, dude. Look at that. -[girl] Ugh, John B.
translation.zh:
‎-好多鱼 老兄 瞧瞧
‎-小约翰

translation.en: [JJ] Been all bait for, like, three weeks.
-[laughs] Gross. -[fish thuds]
[John B] That's JJ, my best friend since the third grade.
translation.zh:
‎这是JJ 从三年级起
‎他就一直是我最好的朋友

translation.en: He's about as local as they come.
Latest in a long line of fishing, drinking,
smuggling, vendetta-holding salt-lifers who made their living off the water.
translation.zh:
‎走私、充满家族仇恨
‎靠海吃海 以海为乐

translation.en: Best surfer I know. Just don't tell him I said that.
translation.zh:
‎是我认识的冲浪最厉害的人
‎这话别告诉他

translation.en: Mild kleptomaniac and a future tax cheat.
translation.zh: ‎有点小偷小摸 未来的偷税漏税者

translation.en: -[girl] Do we have a name? -[girl 2] Hey!
-Hey. -[girl] Is this guy in prison?
-How has that not happened? -Come on.
Get off me. Don't even get me started on microplastic.
translation.zh: ‎怎么还没坐牢？放开我！ ‎别让我开始提微塑料的事

translation.en: Have you even heard about that island? That little island of just...
translation.zh: ‎你听说过那个岛吗？就是那个小岛…

translation.en: [John B] And that's Kiara, or Kie, as we call her.
translation.zh: ‎那是琪娅拉 我们叫她“小琪”

translation.en: -Oh, everything-- -[John B] When not saving turtles
translation.zh: ‎如果她没在拯救乌龟、听马利的歌

translation.en: or listening to Marley, or getting a dolphin tattoo, she hangs out with us.
translation.zh: ‎如果她没在拯救乌龟、听马利的歌 ‎或弄海豚纹身 她就跟我们在一起

translation.en: -[Kie laughs] -I'm not really sure why, though.
So, she's a rich kid, actually.
translation.zh: ‎其实她是个富二代 两边她都有来往

translation.en: -Foot in both worlds. -Stop, guys! My dad is gonna kill me.
translation.zh: ‎其实她是个富二代 两边她都有来往 ‎我爸会杀了我

translation.en: [John B] Her family owns The Wreck, this Outer Banks institution.
translation.zh:
‎沉船是他们家开的
‎这是位于外滩的一家餐厅

translation.en: Total cash cow with the tourists.
translation.zh: ‎做游客生意 堪称摇钱树

translation.en: You know, I'm not really sure how her parents feel about us.
translation.zh: ‎我不清楚她父母怎么看我们

translation.en: -[teens speaking indistinctly] -[John B] We all have a thing for her.
Get out. [chuckles]
[John B] And that's Pope, the brains of the operation...
finalist for the Lucas T. Vanderhorst Merit Scholarship.
translation.zh:
‎卢卡斯T范德霍斯特优秀奖学金
‎的最后入围者

translation.en: -And the smartest person I know. -Stop touching that.
translation.zh: ‎我认识的最聪明的人 ‎别再碰那个了

translation.en: -I want to be a coroner. -[girl] What?
[John B] Little bit of a weirdo.
His father's this legendary character, Heyward.
translation.zh: ‎好了 他父亲是传奇人物海沃德

translation.en: Anything you wanted on the island, Heyward could get for you.
translation.zh:
‎在岛上 无论你想要什么
‎海沃德都能帮你弄到

translation.en: -Yeah. -Appreciate it.
[John B] Now, I'm not sure Heyward knew what to make of his oddball son,
translation.zh:
‎我不清楚海沃德
‎怎么看自己古怪的儿子

translation.en: but it didn't matter. He was a Pogue, just like the rest of us.
translation.zh: ‎但这不重要 ‎他是小鱼儿 跟我们其他人一样

translation.en: ♪ Baby ♪
[John B] So, that's my crew.
And that's me, John Booker Routledge.
translation.zh: ‎这是我 约翰布克瑞特里奇

translation.en: -Dude! Come on, man. Get outta here. -[can clatters]
[John B] And this is where I live.
-Morning, Kie. -Morning.
[John B] An old fish shack on the marsh. The Château, as my dad used to call it.
translation.zh:
‎沼泽里的一个旧渔屋
‎我爸以前叫它‎“‎城堡‎”

translation.en: There's Dad.
He disappeared at sea nine months ago, looking for a shipwreck.
translation.zh:
‎九个月前 他去寻找一艘沉船
‎在海上失踪了

translation.en: Who disappears at sea these days?
I miss him.
And then there's Mom. She split when I was three.
translation.zh: ‎这是我妈 我三岁时她就走了

translation.en: Last I heard, she was in Colorado. I think it was Colorado.
translation.zh:
‎上次听说她是在科罗拉多州
‎应该是科罗拉多州吧

translation.en: Uncle T!
[John B] That's Uncle T.
Since Dad's vanished, he's supposedly my legal guardian.
translation.zh:
‎自从爸爸人间蒸发后
‎他理应是我的法定监护人

translation.en: At the moment, he's in Mississippi, building houses...
translation.zh: ‎目前他正在密西西比盖房子…

translation.en: -[John B] Hey. -[Pope] Oy.
...which means it's just me right now, on my own, hangin' out with my friends.
translation.zh:
‎…也就是说 现在就我自己
‎自给自足 和朋友们一起

translation.en: Three months after my dad was missing, he was officially presumed dead.
translation.zh:
‎我爸失踪三个月后
‎官方假定他已经死亡

translation.en: I refused to sign the papers.
Until I see a body, I'm not giving up.
translation.zh: ‎除非看到尸体 否则我不会放弃

translation.en: John, it's come to our attention
that you are an unemancipated minor living on your own. [sighs]
[scoffs] No... No.
No.
[social worker] I need honesty to help you.
translation.zh: ‎约翰 你得诚实我才能帮你

translation.en: -That's what we want, right? -[John B] Yeah.
I'm being honest.
Okay, then when is the last time you spoke to your uncle?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 那你上次和叔叔说话
‎是什么时候？

translation.en: Uh... 34 minutes ago.
When's the last time you saw him?
Two hours and... 43 minutes ago?
John, we're gonna come out there tomorrow to talk to your uncle.
translation.zh: ‎约翰 明天我们会来找你叔叔谈

translation.en: If he's not there, we're gonna move forward with foster care.
translation.zh: ‎如果他不在 我们就开始找寄养家庭

translation.en: I want to assure you, we're gonna find you a safe and loving home.
translation.zh:
‎我向你保证
‎我们会给你找到一个安全温馨的家

translation.en: [John B] They actually thought I was gonna be happy to hear that.
translation.zh: ‎他们还真以为我听到这话会开心

translation.en: [John B] And that's where this story starts.
-[teens laughing] -[John B] My dad missing, my uncle MIA,
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸失踪 叔叔不见踪影

translation.en: and the Bride of Frankenstein threatening foster care.
translation.zh:
‎科学怪人的新娘
‎威胁要给我找寄养家庭

translation.en: [Pope] Mrs. Jefferson was the Swamp Thing.
-[John B] But I caught a break. -[reporter] Hurricane Agatha continues
translation.zh:
‎但我突然交了好运 ‎飓风阿加莎继续朝着基尔代尔岛
‎不断靠近

translation.en: its steady march towards Kildare Island
translation.zh:
‎飓风阿加莎继续朝着基尔代尔岛
‎不断靠近

translation.en: -on the Outer Banks of North Carolina... -Holy shit.
translation.zh:
‎-该岛位于北卡罗来纳州的外滩
‎-天哪

translation.en: [John B] Hurricane Agatha, coming in the same day DCS was supposed to do my assessment.
translation.zh:
‎儿童服务部准备评估我的这一天
‎飓风阿加莎来了

translation.en: -Hey, Howie. -[storm siren blaring]
[man] I need some sandbags over here!
[woman] We gotta board this up!
[woman on phone] DCS, can I help you?
translation.zh: ‎这里是儿童服务部 有什么能帮您？

translation.en: Yeah, uh... I think we're probably gonna have to reschedule.
translation.zh: ‎有 我想我们可能得重新安排了

translation.en: -It's a double overhead out there, bro. -Double overhead?
translation.zh:
‎-浪有两倍身体高了 兄弟
‎-两倍身体高？

translation.en: Those aren't surfable waves, bro.
translation.zh: ‎这种浪不适合冲浪 兄弟

translation.en: [laughs] Says who?
Oh, shit!
[John B] What the hell?
-[cell phone clicks] -No service?
No power. Great.
Yo, JJ, you been outside?
[JJ] I have polio, bro. I can't walk.
translation.zh: ‎我有小儿麻痹症 兄弟 我不能走路

translation.en: [John B yawning] Oh, man.
That's no good.
That is not good.
[John B] Oh, man.
-[JJ] Agatha did some work, huh? -[John B] Yeah, she did.
translation.zh:
‎-飓风阿加莎杀伤力很大嘛
‎-是的 没错

translation.en: [JJ] What you thinkin'?
I'm thinkin' that storm surge pushed all the crabs out on the marsh maze.
translation.zh: ‎我想风暴潮把螃蟹都冲到沼泽里了

translation.en: All those drum are gonna chase the crab.
What about the DCS? Wasn't that today?
translation.zh: ‎儿童服务部怎么办？不是今天来吗？

translation.en: Nah, they're not gettin' on a ferry.
Come on, think about it.
It's God tellin' us to fish.
-[JJ] Yeah. -[John B] It's kind of a smuggler's boat.
Uh... Good mornin'!
[JJ] Sure hope Guffy's boat didn't sink.
-He doesn't have insurance. -[John B] Yeah.
Hi, Miss Amy! You guys get through it?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 艾米小姐！你们挺过来了？

translation.en: [Amy] Still here.
-[JJ] She totally looked at me. -[John B] I saw it.
-Dude, look at this place. -[JJ whistles]
-Agatha, what did you do? -[John B] She is a crazy lady.
translation.zh: ‎飓风阿加莎 你干了什么？ ‎它真是个疯女人

translation.en: -[JJ] Hard-core. -Phew.
-[JJ] Hurricane surge. -Yeah.
-[JJ] We'll be cleaning this all summer. -[John B] That is my nightmare.
translation.zh:
‎-整个夏天我们得清理这里
‎-真是我的噩梦

translation.en: -Well, look who we have here. -[JJ whoops]
[John B] We have a safety meeting. Attendance mandatory.
translation.zh: ‎要召开安全会议 必须出席

translation.en: -[mimics static] -I can't. My pop's got me on lockdown.
translation.zh: ‎我来不了 我爸爸把我禁足了

translation.en: Come on, man. [mimics static]
Your dad's a pussy. Over.
translation.zh: ‎你爸爸是个胆小鬼 完毕

translation.en: Oh, I heard that, you little bastard.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我听见了 你这个小杂种

translation.en: -We need your son. -[JJ] Yeah, and island rules.
translation.zh:
‎-我们需要你儿子
‎-对 岛上的规矩

translation.en: Day after a hurricane's a free day.
-[Heyward] Who made that up? -[JJ] Uh...
Pentagon, I think. We have security clearance.
translation.zh: ‎我想是五角大楼吧 我们有安全权限

translation.en: -I have a card. -[Heyward] Think I'm stupid?
-I'll do it tomorrow. I promise. Tomorrow. -You think-- No, no.
translation.zh: ‎我明天会做 我保证明天会做 ‎不 绝对不行 你现在就做

translation.en: Hell no. You doin' it right now.
translation.zh: ‎不 绝对不行 你现在就做

translation.en: -[whispers] Get in the boat. -[JJ] Make a run for it.
-Boy, if you get in that boat-- -[JJ] How does that feel?
translation.zh:
‎-如果你…小子 如果你上船…
‎-感觉如何？

translation.en: -Go, go, go. -Bring your ass back up here. -I promise I'll do it tomorrow, Dad. -Whoo!
translation.zh:
‎-走！我保证明天会做 爸爸
‎-给我滚回来

translation.en: [Heyward] You gonna clean shrimp,
translation.zh: ‎等你回来 你要清理小虾

translation.en: -clean fish. -Love you, Pops.
-You'll clean your dirty-ass room! -We'll bring him back in one piece.
translation.zh:
‎-你要打扫你脏兮兮的房间！
‎-我们会把他完璧归赵的

translation.en: -I promise! -And I don't like your friends!
translation.zh:
‎-我答应你
‎-我不喜欢你的朋友！

translation.en: [JJ] Oh, top o' the mornin' to ya.
-Good morning. -[John B] Morning.
translation.zh:
‎-早啊 帅哥们
‎-你拿的什么？

translation.en: [Pope] Whatcha got? You got some juice boxes?
translation.zh:
‎-早啊 帅哥们
‎-你拿的什么？ ‎果汁箱？

translation.en: [Kie] You know, just some yogurts and carrot sticks.
translation.zh: ‎你知道的 就是一些酸奶和胡萝卜条

translation.en: -How about my kind of juice box? -Yeah.
[John B] Brace for impact.
-[Kie] Salud. -[JJ] Skoal.
-[glasses clink] -[JJ] Tell the world. A party trick.
translation.zh:
‎-我们的生活太美妙了
‎-我给你们看个绝技

translation.en: Terrifying. [JJ] Hey, Pope. Can you go a little faster?
translation.zh:
‎-吓死我了
‎-嘿 教皇 能再快点吗？

translation.en: -Here we go. I'm movin'. -[Pope] Doesn't work.
translation.zh:
‎-天 来吧 我走了
‎-行不通

translation.en: -We've tried this like 6,000 times. -[JJ] I got this. It's gonna work!
translation.zh:
‎-我们试过无数次了
‎-我能行！可以的！

translation.en: -[Kie] You're getting beer in my hair! -[Pope] Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
‎哦 我的天！
‎你把啤酒弄我头发上了！

translation.en: All right. All right!
-[John B] All right, you're done. -[Pope] All right, stop!
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 你完了
‎-好了 JJ 停下！

translation.en: -[Kie] Jesus, Pope! -[groans]
-[groans] -[John B] You okay, JJ?
I think my heels touched the back of my head.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉脚后跟磕到后脑勺了

translation.en: -[groaning] -Kie, you okay?
-[Kie] I'm all right. -[all moaning]
[JJ] Pope, what did you do?
[Pope] Sandbar. The channel changed.
No shit.
Ugh, this is probably gonna mess this whole place up.
translation.zh: ‎风暴潮可能把整个地方都搞得一团糟

translation.en: -[JJ] Hey, I saved the beer, though. -[John B] Congrats, JJ.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 但我把啤酒救下来了 ‎祝贺你 JJ

translation.en: Guys... I think there's a boat down there.
-Shut up. What? -[Kie] No way.
No, no, guys. I'm serious. There's a boat down there.
translation.zh: ‎不 各位 我说真的 ‎下面真的有艘船

translation.en: -For real. -[John B] Guys... is this...
It's a boat!
[Kie] Holy shit, he's right. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 他说得对！ ‎我们下去吧

translation.en: [Pope] You think there's a dead body down there?
-Guys, wait up! -[Kie] Whoo!
-[JJ] Get your ass in here! -[John B] Come on!
-[gasps] You guys saw that? -[Pope] Yeah. -Yeah, I did. -[John B] Yeah.
That's a Grady-White.
A new one of those is like 500 Gs, easy.
translation.zh: ‎一艘新船的价格能高达50万美元

translation.en: -Okay! -[JJ] That's a primo rig.
Yeah. That's the boat I saw when I surfed the surge.
translation.zh:
‎对 发生风暴潮时
‎我在冲浪 看到了那艘船

translation.en: -Maybe it hit the jetty or something. -You surfed the surge?
translation.zh:
‎-可能撞上了防波堤之类的

Right. Well, stupid things have good outcomes all the time.
translation.zh: ‎对 好吧 干愚事经常会有好结果

translation.en: [JJ] All we need to do is figure out a way to get into the cargo hold of that wreck.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在要做的
‎就是想办法进入沉船上的货舱

translation.en: Until then, we just lay low. Just act normal.
translation.zh: ‎那之前 我们保持低调 正常行事

translation.en: -[sighs] -Right. And how exactly do we do that?
translation.zh: ‎对 我们到底该怎么做呢？

translation.en: -Kegger? -[rock music playing]
-[John B] Tally-ho. -[JJ] Hey-up.
-No. Hell, no. -[JJ] I'll take it!
-[girl chanting] Chug it! Chug it! -♪ So, girl, don't act so surprised ♪
[John B] You can't understand the Outer Banks without understanding the boneyard.
It's kinda like a three-layer burrito.
translation.zh: ‎它就像个三层的墨西哥卷饼

translation.en: Yo, what's up, homie?
-What's up, man? -What's goin' on?
[John B] There's us and our friends, the working-class derelicts.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们和我们的朋友
‎来自僻地的工薪阶层流浪汉

translation.en: [John B] Yeah.
-Hey, hey. -Hey.
[John B] Then, there are the Kooks, the rich second-homers.
They're mostly from poncey-ass boarding schools,
translation.zh: ‎他们大多是寄宿学校的预科生

translation.en: just rich trustafarian posers.
translation.zh: ‎靠信托基金收益过活的富小孩

translation.en: Our natural enemies.
And then, there are the Tourons.
[John B] Want a beer?
[John B] Totally clueless. Here for a week on vacation with their families.
translation.zh:
‎完全搞不清楚状况
‎跟家人来这里度假一周

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey, you, uh... you want a beer?
[John B] Chum for the sharks.
We are family!
[laughs] If you treat me.
-Oh, really? -Yeah.
Virgos are, like, so organized.
Like, all my friends that are Virgos are like--
It's kinda weird when on TV, we see people die,
translation.zh:
‎奇怪的是
‎我们在电视上看到有人要死了

translation.en: and they just kinda sit there, but in actuality,
translation.zh: ‎他们好像就坐在那里 而现实中

translation.en: they would be shitting and farting up a storm.
-[John B] ...you read about... -[boy] Sarah! Sarah, be careful, okay?
-What is she doing here? -It's so... Huh?
[John B] That's Sarah Cameron. Kook princess.
translation.zh:
‎那是莎拉卡梅隆：鲨鱼公主
‎琪娅拉9年级时的闺蜜

translation.en: Kiara's best friend in the ninth grade, worst enemy in the tenth grade.
translation.zh:
‎那是莎拉卡梅隆：鲨鱼公主
‎琪娅拉9年级时的闺蜜 ‎10年级时最大的敌人

translation.en: I work on her dad's boats, so, you know, I've seen her around.
translation.zh: ‎我在她爸船上工作 所以我常见到她

translation.en: [boy] What are you doing?
[John B] Then that's Topper, her not so pleasant boyfriend.
translation.zh:
‎这是托佩尔
‎她不那么招人待见的男朋友

translation.en: Topper actually thinks Pogues were bred to mow lawns.
translation.zh:
‎事实上 托佩尔认为
‎小鱼儿们天生就该割草坪

translation.en: [worker] Sorry, museum's closed.
Yeah, sure, chief. I'll be just a minute.
translation.zh: ‎是的 当然 长官 ‎马上就好

translation.en: [worker] The Royal Merchant sunk in the great storm of 1829
translation.zh: ‎1829年 皇家商船在大风暴中沉船

translation.en: with $400 million of British government gold onboard.
translation.zh: ‎英国政府价值四亿美元的黄金在船上

translation.en: The dream of generations of islanders.
-[whispers] Yeah. Huh. -Lovely work, don't you think?
Mm-hm. Yeah. Lovely. [chuckles softly]
[boy] Let's go.
-[JJ whistles] -[John B] How you doing? -[JJ] John B. -[John B] What're you doing?
-Yo, what's up? -I got this for you.
translation.zh: ‎我给你拿了这个 你想要这个吗？

translation.en: -Want it? -For me? Yeah, I'll take a sip.
translation.zh:
‎-给我的？好啊 我喝一口
‎-嗨

translation.en: -[Sarah] Hi. -Oh, wait. Hey, hey. Hey, Sarah!
Sarah, can I interest you in a tasty Milwaukee beverage?
translation.zh:
‎莎拉 我能给你介绍一款
‎好喝的密尔沃基饮料吗？

translation.en: No, thanks.
-Is it not fancy enough for you? -No. We were just leaving.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得不够高档吗？
‎-不 我们要走了

translation.en: Hey, you know what? I'll take it.
-I'll-- Thank you, man. I appreciate it. -[JJ] That's nice, but I didn't ask you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 伙计 感谢 ‎你提出来很好 不过我没问你

translation.en: If you said pretty please, maybe,
translation.zh:
‎如果你说求求你了 或许可以
‎但你没说

translation.en: -but you didn't. -Oh, pretty please.
translation.zh:
‎如果你说求求你了 或许可以
‎但你没说 ‎-噢 求求你了
‎-莎拉 我保证你可以喝

translation.en: -[JJ] Yeah. Sarah. -Pretty please? You can have it.
translation.zh:
‎-噢 求求你了
‎-莎拉 我保证你可以喝

translation.en: -[Topper] She doesn't want it, you-- -[Sarah] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎她不想要 你这个该死的混蛋

translation.en: No, no, no, no.
-[JJ] You're so funny, man. -Hey. -[Topper] Dirty Pogues! -[both grunt]
translation.zh:
‎-你真搞笑 朋友
‎-脏脏的小鱼儿！

translation.en: -[Sarah] Oh! -[Pope] John B.
-We're supposed to be incognito, remember? -[Sarah] Babe, babe, babe, babe--
translation.zh: ‎我们应该要低调行事 记得吗？ ‎宝贝！

translation.en: [Sarah] Guys? Guys!
Chill!
Hey, John B, don't make me drown you like your old man, all right?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 小约翰 别逼我淹死你
‎像你老爹一样 好吗？

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Fight! Fight! Fight! Fight!
-[boy] Give it to him! -John B, let it go!
translation.zh:
‎-揍他 伙计！
‎-小约翰 算了 兄弟！

translation.en: [Kie] Stop, you guys!
[Sarah] Topper! Stop!
[Pope] Come on, John B!
[crowd] Fight! Fight! Fight! Fight!
-That's what I'm talkin' about! -Come on!
-Come on! -Yeah, you wanna go?
Stop!
John B!
Oh! Topper!
Come on, Topper!
Let's go!
Come on!
Oh, my God.
[Topper] Come on, man!
Topper!
Topper, stop! No!
[Pope] No!
-I know. -He's drowning him.
Topper!
Yeah, you know what that is.
Your move, broski.
-Come on. Chill, dude! -JJ!
translation.zh:
‎-他有枪！
‎-别这样 冷静 伙计！

translation.en: -[Pope] Chill! -[Sarah] Stop! JJ!
-Put the gun down. -Did you say somethin', princess?
translation.zh:
‎-把枪放下
‎-你说什么 公主？

translation.en: -[Topper] We're good. We're good. -Put the gun down!
All right? Come on, man!
Kie! Can you check your psycho friend, please?
translation.zh: ‎琪！管管你的神经病朋友 好吗？

translation.en: Okay, everyone, listen up! Get the hell off our side of the island!
translation.zh: ‎好的 大家都听着！ ‎岛上的这一边是我们的地盘 快滚

translation.en: -Are you crazy? You idiot! -Stupid!
-Why do that? -It's not worth it! -I'm saving his life, okay? -Stupid!
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么那样做？
‎-我救了他的命 好吗？

translation.en: -You're gonna jeopardize everything! -[panting]
translation.zh: ‎笨蛋 你会把一切都毁了！

translation.en: [John B] There's something about my father I haven't mentioned.
translation.zh: ‎关于我爸 有件事我没提起

translation.en: The week before he went missing, he says to me,
translation.zh: ‎他消失之前那周 他对我说

translation.en: "Bird, I think I found something.
translation.zh: ‎“小鸟 我想我发现了些东西

translation.en: Your Uncle T's gonna come stay for a while.
I might have to vanish for a bit."
So, he talks about vanishing,
and he vanishes.
Everyone says he was lost at sea, but...
translation.zh: ‎大家都说他在海上失踪了 但…

translation.en: he's still out there. I know it.
translation.zh: ‎他还在某个地方 我知道

translation.en: Get decent, sweetie. We need to talk.
translation.zh: ‎打扮一下 亲爱的 ‎我们得谈谈

translation.en: Sorry to break in like this, but DCS called.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉这样闯进来
‎但儿童服务部打电话来了

translation.en: They wanted me to check on you. See how you're doin'.
translation.zh: ‎他们要我查看一下你的情况

translation.en: So, how are you, besides the--
Oh, no, I'm-- I'm great. Yeah, fantastic. Uh...
translation.zh: ‎噢 我很好 对 好极了

translation.en: Thanks for comin' by.
I'm so glad to hear you say that, John B, but I heard a few things that worried me.
translation.zh:
‎很高兴听到你这样说 小约翰
‎但我听说了几件事 有点担心

translation.en: Let me see if I can remember.
Oh, yeah.
One of the things I heard was that your Uncle Teddy, your guardian,
translation.zh: ‎我听说你泰迪叔叔 你的监护人

translation.en: hasn't been in the state for three months.
-That's false. -You don't have to say anything.
I know it's true. I called the school.
translation.zh: ‎我知道这是真的 我给学校打电话了

translation.en: They said you used to be a good student, but now you're failin' all your classes.
translation.zh:
‎他们说你以前是个好学生
‎但现在所有科目的都挂科了

translation.en: No. No, I'm only failing one, and it's history.
translation.zh: ‎不 我只有一科挂了 是历史

translation.en: -He's a dick. He's out for me-- -[sheriff] I heard
translation.zh:
‎-那家伙是个混蛋 专门针对我
‎-我听说昨天在沙滩上

translation.en: there was a fight on the beach yesterday,
translation.zh:
‎-那家伙是个混蛋 专门针对我
‎-我听说昨天在沙滩上 ‎有人打架

translation.en: -and a gun was involved. -Okay. Gun?
translation.zh: ‎有人还涉嫌用枪 ‎好吧 枪？

translation.en: No.
Did I get in a dustup? Yes, but was there a gun?
translation.zh: ‎我有没有打架？有 但有一把枪？

translation.en: [scoffs] No. No way.
[sheriff] That's okay. I know who it was. I'll get to him.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 我知道那人是谁 我会去找他

translation.en: All I'm worried about right now is makin' sure you're in a safe home.
translation.zh:
‎我现在关心的是
‎确保你住在一个安全的家里

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah, super safe. -Super sound, sturdy. You know? -[taps table]
translation.zh:
‎是的 超级安全 超级完善 坚固
‎你懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: -Uncle T's coming, so... -[sheriff] That what he told you?
translation.zh:
‎-泰叔要回来了 所以…
‎-他这么告诉你的？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[sheriff] If he is coming,
I think you should be allowed to stay.
Thank you.
But if I stick my neck out for you, you have to help me.
translation.zh: ‎但如果我为你冒险 你也得帮我

translation.en: Tit for tat.
What-- what does tat mean?
Let me see, how can you help me? Oh, I know.
translation.zh:
‎让我想想你能怎么帮我？
‎哦 我知道

translation.en: So, a body was found in the marsh yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎昨天有人在沼泽里发现了一具尸体

translation.en: Were you in the marsh yesterday?
-Yeah, we were fishin' for some drum. -You catch anything?
translation.zh:
‎-是的 我们在钓鼓鱼
‎-钓到了吗？

translation.en: Nah, we were skunked.
[sheriff] Strange. Fishing's usually good after a storm.
translation.zh: ‎奇怪 暴风雨后通常很容易钓到鱼

translation.en: All sorts of things get stirred up.
You come across a wreck yesterday?
translation.zh: ‎昨天你我无意间发现了一艘沉船？

translation.en: No.
You skimmin' just above the surface, John B.
translation.zh: ‎你刚好待在水面之上 小约翰

translation.en: Now, down here is foster care, juvie.
translation.zh: ‎这以下是寄养家庭 少管所

translation.en: Pretty big drop for a smart kid like you.
translation.zh: ‎对你这样聪明的孩子可太糟了

translation.en: Up here is you and your little friends doing whatever you want.
translation.zh:
‎在上面你和你的小朋友们
‎可以为所欲为

translation.en: Outer Banks...
or foster care on the mainland.
You one inch above the surface, John B.
translation.zh: ‎你就高出水面那么一点点 小约翰

translation.en: If I was you, I'd start flappin' my wings.
translation.zh: ‎如果我是你 就会开始扑腾翅膀

translation.en: Now, you sure you didn't come across a wreck yesterday?
translation.zh:
‎你确定昨天没有无意间
‎发现一艘沉船？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure.
It's better if you didn't, you understand?
I'm gonna look the other way, as long as you stay out of the marsh.
translation.zh:
‎只要你不靠近沼泽
‎我就不会找你麻烦

translation.en: I got dogs livin' better than this, John B.
translation.zh: ‎我的狗住的地方都比这里好 小约翰

translation.en: You might wanna think about cleanin' up.
[John B] Look, I'm callin' it off. All right?
translation.zh: ‎听着 我要取消行动 ‎好吗？

translation.en: Peterkin said, if I stay out of the marsh, she'll help me with DCS.
translation.zh:
‎彼得金说如果我远离沼泽
‎她就帮我对付儿童服务部

translation.en: -[JJ] And you believed her? -Yes, I believe her, JJ.
translation.zh: ‎你相信她？ ‎是的 我相信她 JJ

translation.en: An actual cop, John B. You believed a cop.
translation.zh:
‎一个名副其实的警察 小约翰
‎你相信警察

translation.en: All I gotta do is stay out of the marsh for a couple days, and she'll help me out.
translation.zh:
‎我只需要远离沼泽几天
‎她就会帮我

translation.en: It doesn't help that your ass was the one shooting a gun.
You know what I should have done? Just let Topper drown your ass.
translation.zh:
‎你知道我该做什么吗？
‎我该让托佩尔淹死你

translation.en: -[John B] Topper was gonna drown me? -[JJ] Sure looked like it.
translation.zh:
‎-对 因为托佩尔会淹死我？
‎-看起来就是

translation.en: -[John B] Funny. -[JJ] Have you looked in a mirror?
translation.zh:
‎-你最近有照镜子吗？
‎-继续 再多说点

translation.en: -[John B] Tell me some more. Come on. -They always win, don't they, man?
translation.zh:
‎-你最近有照镜子吗？
‎-继续 再多说点 ‎他们总是赢 不是吗 伙计？

translation.en: Kooks versus Pogues. They always, always win!
-Goddamn! -[Kie] Look, it's okay!
No, it's not okay!
It is not! They don't want us to go down into the marsh.
translation.zh: ‎有关系！他们不想我们去沼泽

translation.en: That means there's something valuable down there, and you know it.
translation.zh: ‎意味着那里有值钱的东西 你知道的

translation.en: I know you do. And I understand why you don't wanna go.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你知道
‎我明白你为什么不想去

translation.en: You're the golden boy. You got way too much to risk. And you--
translation.zh:
‎你人气旺 又成功
‎不能随便就冒险 而你…

translation.en: I mean, you're already rich as fuck anyway.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 反正你已经富得流油了

translation.en: Why would you bother?
But you and me, man, we got nothin' to lose!
translation.zh: ‎但兄弟 你和我 我们一无所有

translation.en: -We really don't, all right? -JJ.
[JJ] And I know it didn't use to be that way for you.
I don't want to talk about this. I don't want to talk about it.
translation.zh: ‎我不想讨论这个 ‎我不想讨论这个

translation.en: -[JJ] So that's it? -Just get out of my way, bro.
[JJ] John B, listen to me. I have a plan.
translation.zh: ‎小约翰 听我说 我有个计划

translation.en: You got the key to Cameron's big boat, right?
translation.zh: ‎你有卡梅隆大船的钥匙 对吧？

translation.en: -[John B] No. -There's scuba gear.
We borrow that, and then we go down to the wreck this afternoon,
translation.zh:
‎我们借装备
‎然后今天下午潜到沉船那里

translation.en: and that is what's gonna save you, man.
You don't see rich kids going into foster care, do you?
translation.zh: ‎没见过有钱人的孩子去寄养家庭吧？

translation.en: [John B] You know, I should have learned a long time ago to never listen to JJ.
He's full of bad ideas, like stealing from my rich boss.
translation.zh:
‎他一肚子馊主意
‎比如从我有钱的老板那儿偷东西

translation.en: -But this time, he was right. -♪ Only dem alon invited ♪
-[John B] I had nothing to lose. -♪ Karina and Sabrina ♪
[John B] My dad said the island was America on steroids.
translation.zh: ‎我爸说这岛就像打了激素的美国

translation.en: The haves and have-nots like anyplace, but magnified and multiplied.
translation.zh:
‎和别处一样有富人和穷人
‎但差距放大和翻倍

translation.en: The way I see it, the game's rigged. Maybe it always has been.
translation.zh:
‎在我看来 游戏被人操控了
‎或许向来如此

translation.en: -No parents, money... -[Sarah] Cheers! ...and no one looking out for me,
I got no chance...
-♪ Up inna har belly weh mi sen it ♪ -...unless I make it on my own.
-♪ Me bad her up ♪ -Oh! Hey.
Are you stalking us? Plotting your revenge?
Yeah. Why don't you just tell your daddy I blew the bilge on Druthers?
translation.zh:
‎是啊 为什么不告诉你爸
‎我把偏爱号的舱底弄坏了？

translation.en: Everything's good to go. Just toppin' off these tanks.
translation.zh: ‎都准备好了 ‎去把氧气罐装满

translation.en: [Sarah] Hey, are you okay?
'Cause that eye of yours looks really gnarly.
translation.zh: ‎因为你的眼神看起来不太对劲

translation.en: [John B] You know what?
You can tell Topper he won the first round.
translation.zh: ‎你可以告诉托佩尔他赢了第一局

translation.en: I'll get him next time.
So there's just gonna be a reign of terror on this island now?
translation.zh: ‎所以现在岛上要开始恐怖统治了？

translation.en: Wars have been started for less, Sarah Cameron.
translation.zh:
‎更小的事情都能引发战争
‎莎拉卡梅隆

translation.en: Okay. Can we drop the whole Pogues versus Kooks thing?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我们能放下
‎小鱼儿和鲨鱼之争吗？

translation.en: It is really stupid.
You know, it's easy to say when you're a Kook.
translation.zh: ‎你是鲨鱼 这么说当然容易

translation.en: [deputy on megaphone] Are y'all ready for a water party today?
translation.zh:
‎大家准备好
‎参加今天的水上派对了吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] All right. Now, all kiddin' aside,
your job today is to help keep privates off the marsh
translation.zh:
‎你们今天的工作是让私人船只
‎别靠近沼泽

translation.en: so we can do our job and find this wreck.
translation.zh: ‎好让我们开展工作 找到沉船

translation.en: That's straight from Sheriff Peterkin.
translation.zh: ‎这是彼得金警长直接下达的命令

translation.en: Do not forget your sunscreen, ladies.
Bring a lot of liquids.
[woman] Does that include Natty Light?
I don't care what swill you bring. That's on your own recognizance.
translation.zh: ‎我不在乎你带什么 ‎你自己担保

translation.en: All right. What else do you got to worry about? Let's go!
translation.zh:
‎好了 你们还有什么担心？
‎我们出发！

translation.en: Pull that for me, will you? Thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh: ‎把那个拉到前面 谢谢你 女士

translation.en: Bill, I'mma get at ya about that tomorrow, all right?
translation.zh: ‎比尔 我明天答复你 好吗？

translation.en: -We're here about the missing boat. -Yeah?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我们为了那艘失踪的船而来

translation.en: -What can I do for you fellas? -Associates of the owner.
translation.zh:
‎-有什么能为你们效劳？
‎-船主的同事

translation.en: -Here to help however we can. -Uh-huh. Right.
We're devastated about Scooter. We just feel sick about it.
translation.zh: ‎斯库特的事让我们很伤心 ‎我们非常难过

translation.en: You mind if we join your armada? Take a look for ourselves?
translation.zh:
‎介意我们加入你的搜索队吗？
‎自己找找看？

translation.en: Yeah, why not? Extra set of eyes.
translation.zh: ‎好啊 干嘛不呢？多几双眼睛

translation.en: We'll let you know if we find anything, Officer.
translation.zh: ‎找到什么我们会通知你 警官

translation.en: -You do that. -[engine starts]
-This is empty. You took empty tanks? -I...
Okay, this one's a quarter full.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这个还剩四分之一

translation.en: It's enough for one of us.
Love it when a plan comes together.
translation.zh: ‎计划慢慢形成 感觉真是太好了

translation.en: Does anybody know how to dive?
-Anybody? -It's kind of a Kook sport.
translation.zh: ‎有谁会吗？ ‎这是鲨鱼们的运动

translation.en: -[sighs] -I... read about it.
Great, Pope read about it, so someone's gonna die.
translation.zh: ‎好极了 教皇读到过 所以有人会死

translation.en: Look, y-you put the thing in your mouth and breathe. How hard could it be?
translation.zh: ‎听着 你把那玩意放嘴里 然后呼吸 ‎这能有多难？

translation.en: If you come up too fast, nitrogen gets into your blood,
translation.zh: ‎如果你上来太快 氮气进入血液

translation.en: and you get the bends.
-Bends like, bend over and... -[Pope] The bends kill you.
translation.zh: ‎减什么？这样吗… ‎减压症会让人没命的

translation.en: -[JJ] Right. -I can-- I can dive.
-[JJ] You can dive. I'm cool with that. -[Kie] Since when can you dive?
translation.zh:
‎-对 你会潜水 我没意见
‎-你什么时候会潜水的？

translation.en: I'll do it. It's fine.
-Let me do some calculations real quick. -You serious?
translation.zh:
‎-让我快速计算一下
‎-你当真吗？

translation.en: -[Pope] That boat's about 30 feet down. -Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 船在9米处 对吧？ ‎好的

translation.en: [Pope] So it'll take 25 minutes at that depth.
Twenty-five.
Which means you need to make your safety stop at about... ten feet.
translation.zh:
‎那意味着为了安全
‎潜到约3米处时要停一下

translation.en: All right? For two minutes.
[John B] Yeah, yeah. Ten feet, two minutes. Got it.
-Uh... -[Pope] What was that all about? I don't know, but I liked it. A lot.
translation.zh:
‎-这是干嘛？
‎-我不知道 但我很喜欢

translation.en: -[Pope] All righty. -Yeah. Uh, when you--
translation.zh: ‎好吧 ‎对 你在下面的时候 去找货舱

translation.en: uh, when you're down there, you look for the cargo hold.
translation.zh: ‎对 你在下面的时候 去找货舱

translation.en: You stick this thing inside and twist and pull, okay?
translation.zh:
‎把这玩意插进去 旋转
‎然后拉出来 好吧？

translation.en: -[John B] Stick in, twist, pull. -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-插进洞里 旋转然后拉
‎-是的

translation.en: -My dad moved weight back in the day. -[Pope] Who didn't?
translation.zh:
‎-我爸爸以前运过毒品
‎-谁没有呢？

translation.en: Hey! I tied my T-shirt to the anchor chain about ten feet down.
translation.zh: ‎嘿！我把T恤绑到锚链约3米的地方

translation.en: It's where you need to do your safety stop.
-[John B] Cool. -[Pope] Keep an eye on this.
You need to make sure you have enough air to decompress.
translation.zh: ‎你得确保有足够的氧气可以减压

translation.en: Okay, how much do I need?
Unclear. Breathe as little as possible.
Zen. Think Zen, you know?
translation.zh: ‎禅 想想禅 你知道吗？

translation.en: -[imitates breathing through mask] -[John B] Yeah. Got it.
[Pope] Hey, if we get caught in the marsh,
translation.zh:
‎嘿 如果被抓到在沼泽出现
‎我们基本上就完蛋了

translation.en: we're basically screwed, so...
translation.zh:
‎嘿 如果被抓到在沼泽出现
‎我们基本上就完蛋了 ‎所以最好开始吧

translation.en: -better get a move on. -[John B] Copy that.
Diver down?
Diver down.
[Pope] Diver down.
-All right. -[JJ] See ya, dude.
Shit. JJ.
Guys, that's the police.
Oh, you gotta be kidding me.
-[JJ] Yep, that's the police. -Just act frickin' normal.
translation.zh: ‎是的 是警察 ‎他妈的表现正常点

translation.en: -Evening, officers. -Evening.
-[officer] Here. -[deputy] Evening.
[Pope] JJ, tie it off.
How you kids doing? You know the marsh is closed?
translation.zh:
‎你们这群孩子们在干什么？
‎知道沼泽关闭了吗？

translation.en: -No. -No. Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-不 我不知道
‎-不 我不知道这件事

translation.en: -I didn't know that. -Why-- why is it closed?
translation.zh:
‎-不 我不知道
‎-不 我不知道这件事 ‎为什么关闭了？

translation.en: Well, we're conducting a search out here. Boat went down.
translation.zh: ‎我们在这里进行搜索 有船沉了

translation.en: -Oh. -[deputy] Seen anything?
-[JJ] No. -No boats. No.
translation.zh:
‎-你们看到什么了吗？
‎-没有 ‎没看到船 没有

translation.en: Where's your friend you always hang with? He here?
translation.zh:
‎经常和你们一起的那位朋友在哪儿？
‎他在这里？

translation.en: He's working.
I'm gonna check your little boat out.
-[JJ] Yeah. -[Pope] Yeah, hop aboard.
-You wanna check-- uh, check her out. -Thank you.
-[deputy] Uh... you got another one? -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这个你还有吗？
‎-是的 当然

translation.en: -[Pope] Yeah, yeah. -Of course. It's, uh... it's in the hold.
translation.zh:
‎-这个你还有吗？
‎-是的 当然 ‎在货舱里

translation.en: -[Pope] Yeah. -Show him.
Yeah, here we go.
-All right. -[JJ] Yeah.
-[Pope] Uh... -[JJ] Be careful. [Pope] Be careful. You don't wanna slip.
All right.
-All right. -All right.
-[deputy] Beautiful day. -[JJ] Sure is.
-[Pope] Very. -[deputy] Let us know
translation.zh: ‎非常美好 ‎离开时如果看到什么 就通知我们

translation.en: if you see anything on your way out.
translation.zh: ‎离开时如果看到什么 就通知我们

translation.en: -Will do. Will do. -[engine starts]
-[JJ] We'll be gone soon, sir. -[deputy] Yes, you will.
translation.zh: ‎我们很快就回去 长官 ‎是的 你们会的

translation.en: [Pope] He's definitely out of air.
-[JJ] There he is! -Oh, God! Jesus Christ!
-Don't scare us like that! -[JJ] How'd it go down there?
translation.zh:
‎-别这样吓我们！
‎-下面情况怎么样？

translation.en: Did you find anything?
Did I find anything?
[JJ] Yeah, there we go! That's my boy!
[Pope] Jeez, dude!
-Dude! -Oh!
-[Kie] You okay? -[panting] Yeah, I ran out of air.
translation.zh: ‎你没事吧？ ‎是的 没氧气了

translation.en: You scared the shit out of me.
Yeah, the cops were up here, but, uh... took care of 'em.
translation.zh: ‎是的 警察来过 但我搞定了

translation.en: -[John B] My bad. -[Pope] You're all good.
[JJ] Yeah, you kinda missed the show, brother.
translation.zh: ‎对 你错过了表演 哥们

translation.en: -Hey, guys? Guys, bogey, two o'clock. -What?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 大家 ‎-有可疑船只 两点钟方向
‎-什么？

translation.en: -[Pope] Do you recognize that boat? -[Kie] I've never seen it.
What are they doing here? The marsh is closed.
translation.zh: ‎他们在那里做什么？沼泽关闭了

translation.en: [JJ] Let's not stick around and find out.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 我们别留在这里
‎去弄清楚吧

translation.en: -JJ, get the bowline. -[JJ] Yeah.
-Should we wait on 'em? -[John B] No, we're not.
translation.zh:
‎-我们该不该等他们？
‎-不 我们不等他们

translation.en: -Go get the stern. Go! -[Kie] Are you joking? JJ, hurry up.
translation.zh:
‎-去船尾 去！
‎-你开玩笑吗？ ‎JJ 快点

translation.en: -[JJ] Guys, don't wait for me. Go. -[Kie] Let's go!
[Pope] Pull out the stern.
-I don't like this. -[JJ] Are they coming for us?
translation.zh:
‎-我不喜欢这感觉
‎-他们来找我们的？

translation.en: [Pope] Maybe they're fishing.
-[JJ] Go, go, go, go! -[Pope] Go into the marsh.
-[Kie] Let's go! -[John B] I'm going. Act natural.
[Kie] Hey, guys, they're following us.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 大家 他们在跟着我们！

translation.en: -[Pope] This can't be good. -Shit.
[JJ] Dude, you gotta go faster!
-I'm going! -Gun it!
-[Pope] What the... -[Kie] Holy shit!
[JJ] John B, get down!
[Pope] We're gonna die!
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的天 我们要死了！

translation.en: Shit! Pope, move.
-[Kie yells] -Get down, Kie!
-Oh, my God! Whoo! -[Kie] Whew!
[JJ] Booyeah! Pogue god, man!
-See you, guys! -[Kie] That was insane!
[Kie] Oh, God.
-What do you think it is? -[John B] Gotta be money, right?
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得这是什么？
‎-肯定是钱什么的 对吧？

translation.en: That or a couple of keys with street value to the low- to mid-mils!
translation.zh:
‎要么是钱
‎要么几把价值成百上千万的钥匙

translation.en: -[Pope] Can we please just open the bag? -[John B] Wow, Pope.
translation.zh: ‎我们能打开包了吗？ ‎哇 教皇

translation.en: That's a rare outburst of emotion.
Okay. You guys are literally killing me with anticipation.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你们真的让我迫不及待了

translation.en: -Open the bag. -[JJ] Jeez.
[Pope] We almost died over this.
[Pope] Oh, wow. Yup. That's about right.
Good job, everybody. We found a compass.
translation.zh: ‎干得漂亮 大家伙 ‎我们找到了一个罗盘

translation.en: Dude, what? It's not worth anything.
translation.zh: ‎哥们 怎么？这根本不值钱

translation.en: This was my father's.
